title: What is the interpretation of dreaming about losing teeth according to Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi?
headings: Please provide the Arabic text you want me to translate. I need the actual text within the square brackets "[]" for me to do the translation.

preview.html: html
preview.text: Please provide me with the Arabic text you want me to translate. I need the text to be able to translate it accurately into English. 😊

title: I dreamed that my sister gave birth to twins.

preview.html:
html

But I dreamed that my sister gave birth to twins in a dream, each of the single, married, man, pregnant, young and divorced differs according to the condition of each in the dream.

Interpretation of seeing a sister giving birth to twins in a dream about a single girl

  • Seeing a girl unmarried in a dream that she is pregnant with twins or to see her sister pregnant with twins while she is in the study stage.
    • An indication that the girl is suffering from stress and tension from her studies during the coming examination period and the appearance of its results
  • Either in the case where the unmarried girl saw in her dream that she was pregnant with twins.
    • Her vision indicates that the woman is on a wrong path in her life that is not good for her.
  • She will also find pain, sadness, and fatigue in this way, and this will be the result of the girl entering into emotional relationships that make her unhappy.
    • At the same time, the vision is a warning for her to master her choice and review the decision before making it in order to walk the right path.
  • If the unmarried girl dreamed that she was pregnant with twins, and the type of twins was male and female.
    • It is mentioned that the girl is going through difficult financial circumstances that make her go back to debts
  • If an unmarried girl dreamed that she was pregnant with twins and gave birth to females in a dream.
    • The vision tells her that she is close to the Almighty God and is always striving to please him.
  • At the same time, scholars of evacuation interpret the vision.
    • It is an indication of the level of abundant provision and the large amount of money that the girl will receive in the coming period.
    • As the female twin indicates the presence of good in general.
  • If a girl in her life is chasing hopes and aspirations that she wants to achieve and dreams of giving birth to two twin girls in her dream.
    • Her vision will come true and she will get what she wants.
  • Seeing a girl unmarried that her sister gave birth to her in her dream.
    • The vision is an indication that the girl will love someone and communicate with him and marry him.
    • But this marriage or relationship will not last long, and both parties will resort to separation.
  • The pregnancy of an unmarried girl in a dream with twins indicates that the unmarried girl is suffering from a disease.
    • It was also interpreted as a sign of problems and crises in her life that she will go through in the coming period.

Watch also: I dreamed that I gave birth to a son , Interpretation of Ibn Sirin

Explain the witness that my sister gave birth to twins in a dream for a married woman

  • Interpretation of seeing a married woman in her dream that she is pregnant with twins.
    • And the vision shows that God will honor her in the coming season with good, blessings and good news, God willing.
  • And if the married woman saw that she gave birth to twins in her dream.
    • It is one of the commendable visions in the dictionary of dream interpretation.
    • As she lives in the next stage of her life a stable and peaceful life, and understanding with her husband, which makes them happy with each other.
  • If the married woman dreams in her sleep that she is pregnant with twins.
    • And she found her sad because it indicates that she will be exposed to a lot of pain, worry, and sorrow, and God knows best.
  • Seeing a woman married that she gave birth to twins in her sleep.
    • Her vision is interpreted that a person from her noble family will suffer from poverty, and God and His Messenger know best.
  • A married woman dreamed in a dream that she gave birth to triplets.
    • The vision indicates that the married woman will give birth to many children and will have many offspring.
  • As for the birth of twins in the dream of a married woman in general.
    • A great indication that God is pleased with this vision and honors her with guidance.
    • It keeps away from her the bad thoughts that push her to commit sins and transgressions.

Interpretation of seeing a sister giving birth to twins in a dream about a man and its meaning

  • The married man sees that his wife is pregnant with twins and gave birth to a boy and a girl.
    • Good news for him with the coming of blessings and abundance of provision in the coming period, and he should wait and be patient until he gets it.
  • Either in the case where the man saw in a dream that his sister gave birth to twins and they were males.
    • His vision is an example of excellence and progress in his work.
    • The vision also indicates that the owner of the vision will receive a high promotion, so that he will be prominent in his community.
  • If a married man sees a twin pregnancy in a dream.
    • The function of his vision is the calm and stability that the seer lives in and that his psychological state is in complete comfort.
  • If the man's wife is pregnant and gave birth to twins, a boy and a girl, in a dream.
    • His vision indicates that this man spends a lot of money on trivial places that do not benefit him in his life
  • The twins were in a married man's dream and the twins were fighting.
    • It indicates the occurrence of problems and obstacles in the way of this opinion in his afterlife, and God and His Messenger know best
  • Seeing a man in a dream that the twins are playing and enjoying themselves.
    • One of the happy and promising visions as it shows her family and her home.
    • Filled with joy and pleasure and lives a happy family life.
  • If the man sees in a dream that his wife is giving birth to twins.
    • An indication that the seer is one of the calm and responsible personalities among people.

Read also: Interpretation of a dream of giving birth to a handsome boy for a married, single, and pregnant woman

The meaning of seeing that my sister gave birth to twins in a pregnant woman's dream and its interpretation

  • If the pregnant woman dreams that she is giving birth to two twin boys.
    • Her vision is an indication that she will be exposed to problems and health problems during pregnancy.
    • As well as the period after her delivery.
  • If the pregnant woman dreams that she is giving birth to twins.
    • And it is a vision that does not like her pregnancy and the passage of menstruation well.
  • But if a pregnant woman dreams that she is giving birth to twins in her dream Inaas.
    • A sign of an easy and natural birth, and God knows best.
  • It also indicates her giving birth to twins in a dream of a pregnant woman .
    • So that her pregnancy passes safely and securely, God willing.
  • And in the case that the pregnant woman does not give birth naturally and needs a cesarean section.
    • It indicates the ease of this operation and the good passage of delivery.
    • And she will have a healthy child, God willing.

Interpretation of seeing a sister giving birth to twins in a young man's dream and its meaning

  • The function of seeing a young unmarried man in a dream that his sister gave birth to him twins.
    • In his stable psychological state, and he will achieve peace of mind in his life, God willing.
  • As for seeing triplets in a young man's dream and there were some problems between him and the girl he was in a relationship with.
    • Good news that the problems between them will end, God willing.
  • Either the young man is single and not engaged and saw triplets in his dream.
    • An indication that the young man will overcome many obstacles and obstacles.
    • His life will pass and God knows best, and he will overcome them.
  • Seeing triplets in a young man's dream may indicate his success and excellence after his failure, especially in his work.
  • Seeing a young man carrying his twin sister or a member of his family in a dream.
    • A sign that she will participate emotionally in the coming period and should wait.

You may be interested in: Interpretation of birth in a dream according to Imam al-Sadiq

title: Dream interpretation of milking a cow in a dream

preview.text: Dreaming of milking a cow indicates abundant fortune and other interpretations, which we will explain for single, married, pregnant and divorced men, such as milking milk or buffalo milk or goat milk - seeing a milking cow by Ibn Sirin and others. On: Interpreting a dream about a cow in a dream, milking cows or milking cows in a dream, is a sign of sufficient livelihood; because milk in interpretation indicates money or benefits, whoever dreams that he is milking his cow, will achieve goodness and money in that year. A reference to the interpretation of seeing milking a cow or any type of animal in a dream, and this indicates good companionship, flattery, politics, earning a living and appreciating milking. Whoever dreams that he is milking a cow and drinking its milk, will become rich if he is poor, trustworthy and honorable, and if he is rich, his wealth and dignity will increase. Whoever sees that he is milking a cow and does not drink its milk, this indicates that he collects a lot of money but does not benefit from it. Whoever dreams that he is milking a camel has received money from his master, because milking is impure blood with illegal money, and milking is cunning. Milking camels is work in the land of the Arabs, and milking the lucky is work in the land of non-Arabs. If it milked its blood, then it betrays the ruler in his authority, and if the milking was poison, then it harvests illegal money, and camels and drinking from its milk, marries a righteous woman, and if he is married, he will have a son. He is born into a blessing, and God Almighty. Milking the cow: If you dream that you are milking a cow, this indicates great opportunities that have been presented to you, but you have not taken advantage of them yet. Otherwise, the dream may mean that you are being milked or exploited by others. Milking cows If you dream that you are milking and the milk is abundant in its rush from the udder, and the cow is excited and agitated, this means that many opportunities will escape you, but you will soon win. Whoever dreams that he is milking blood and blood came out of his udder, it is interpreted as a violation of the king, even if it is a dream. A reference to the interpretation of seeing milking a cow or any type of animal in a dream, and this indicates good companionship, flattery, politics and earning a living. If a person sees milk flowing from the earth, it will be unfair to the people of that place. Some interpreters see milking a cow in a dream as a sign of exploitation or a symbol of greed and avarice. Some of them did not like the interpretation of the dream, especially if the dreamer or the dreamer was not the one who milked the cow in the dream. It is detestable in interpretation to see the sleeper in his dream as someone else other than him milking his cow, especially if there is enmity, competition or disagreement between them, this dream may indicate a loss resulting from such enmity, and the vision may indicate the following: A serious and disgusting violation that the dreamer is subjected to by his enemies and envious people and haters... Interpreters also disliked seeing a friend milking a friend's cow, because such visions express greed, stinginess and exploitation of that friend for his friend... It is also unpleasant in interpretation to see the sleeper as a stranger milking a familiar cow in a dream. Such dreams may express bad luck, harm or an epidemic that may befall the owner of this cow while awake. It is also disliked in the interpretation of dreams and the expression of the vision to see a dead person milking a cow or drinking its milk... If the cow is unknown, this indicates a year full of worries, troubles and hardships... If it is known, it is evil, harm or loss that may befall its owner. Interpretation of a milking cow in a dream. It is a good year full of livelihoods and good news. The milking cow also indicates the presence of a noble woman, and often symbolizes in men's dreams his wife, and also indicates the pregnancy of a married woman. Whoever dreams that he has a milking cow in his house, then prosperity, blessings and blessings will come to that house and in that year. Whoever asked for food and saw in his dream that a milking cow entered his house or grazes in a place full of grass, this is a very good interpretation, because the milking cow in this context is an explicit symbol that indicates the good coming to the king, which is compatible with his desire, and often the milking cow, such as a fat cow, carries a woman. In the interpretation, it is also a pleasure for those who are in distress, distress or hardship... All colors are praiseworthy in milking cows, but the black cow is one of the most symbolic in the interpretation of dreams that express news and prosperity. Whoever dreams that he is milking a cow until he sees it producing a lot of milk, this is in interpretation a benefit or a lot of money that the dreamer enjoys in that year. Interpretation of a dream about a cow in a dream for a man. Whoever dreams of men as if he is holding the udder of a milking cow and starts milking it until he sees the milk flowing from it, and he has collected this milk in a pot, pot or bucket... this is in interpretation with money that he collects or gains the dreamer as a result of hard work and diligence... And the interpretation came to the milk poured in a container that indicates saved or preserved or collected money. As for the man who sees in a dream that he is milking a cow and does not see its milk flowing, this indicates that the wife is barren and may not give birth... And perhaps the vision indicates the infertility of the man himself... If he saw that the milk spilled or spilled on the ground, then he was not able to collect it in his dream, and in wakeful life, he wastes his money and wastes his livelihood and what his right hand has earned from expenses or excessive payments from religion. .. And perhaps the wasting of the collected milk indicates wasting time in things that are not useful or beneficial. This scene often also indicates the pursuit of whims and pleasures, and the abandonment of work and worship. Interpretation of a dream about a cow in a dream for a single woman. We have mentioned in many places in this blog (Dream Interpretation Site) that a cow in a dream indicates a year. As we mentioned - based on Ibn Sirin - that milk descends with money, and it also indicates instinct and faith, and it is praiseworthy for whoever sees it as if he drank it, and it is also praiseworthy for whoever sees it as if they gave it to others to drink, the cow is known or known, in the interpretation of women. Perhaps she was referring to the mother. If the unmarried woman sees that she is milking that cow, then she benefits from her mother or from any other woman she knows. If the cow in the unmarried woman's dream is unknown (and she does not know its owner), then it is in interpretation a good year, if this cow is fat or its udder is full of milk. If the dreamer is a student or student and sees herself milking this cow, then this dream indicates a successful year... provided that she sees the milk being collected in a clean container or bucket... As for if she sees the milk spilling uselessly on the ground or grass, then the vision in this regard indicates a waste of time and effort. It can also indicate failure and failure. Therefore, the owner of the vision should compensate for what she lacks and double her efforts to achieve academic success in that year. If she has completed the mantra (unmarried) her studies, or if..."

title: Dream Interpretation: Buying a Child in a Dream According to Ibn Sirin

preview.html:
html

If you see yourself buying a child in a dream, this indicates your future situation and it depends on the type of child, whether it is buying a boy or buying a girl or buying a child beautiful or ugly.

Interpretation of buying a child in a dream

Said Ibn Sirin in interpreting the vision of buying a child in a dream that it depends on the type of child.
If a person dreams that he bought a child girl, this means that this person will be subjected to joy and wide living in reality.
Buying a child in a dream symbolizes the existence of something in the dreamer's life that needs a lot of attention and care. Maybe you are burdened by a business project, or you are related to someone who needs your help, or one of your family members is sick, and you will be the one who helps him, and so on.
To dream that you are buying children represents your willingness to help others and lend them a helping hand.

If buying a child in your dream is an indicator of your creativity and hard work, and the vision indicates that you need to release some feelings and express them.

The interpretation of the dream of buying a child is evidence of the duality of your points of view, as you must pay attention to defining your position on certain things so that you are completely clear.
If buying a child in a dream means that you are focusing more on one thing while ignoring other important aspects that also need attention

The interpretation of the dream of buying a child indicates that you may be in a relationship with someone who reminds you of your father or mother or any other family member.
You may be struggling to find answers to some basic questions or you may be seeking the truth about something.

To dream that you are buying a child means longevity, strength, endurance, and eternity. You don't have to deal with what happened in the past to move forward.
If buying a child in a dream means that you are very upset about something someone said, but you can't express your anger properly, and the vision is a warning to you that it may be time to start a new beginning and leave the past behind you.
Whoever sees that he is buying children's sets in a dream will get a lot of money
Sometimes dreaming of buying a child for bad luck is a warning sign of a potentially dangerous situation. The dream, unfortunately, is a warning of low self-esteem and confidence. You neglect yourself a lot while trying hard to please others.
If the owner of the vision works in the field of buying and selling and saw that he was buying a beautiful child, this indicates that he will earn money through a successful business deal.
Whoever dreams of buying a child will fall in love, and whoever buys a child will be fine.

Seeing the purchase of children may reflect the dreamer's desire to adopt because he cannot have children, or because his wife does not want to get pregnant, or something similar.

Whoever saw that he sold a male child brings good for himself, and whoever sold a male child does not have good for him.
If you dream of buying a child that is very beautiful, this indicates success and blessings in your life.

If someone dreams that he sold a child in his dream, this means that this person will gain great good in reality.
As for if a person sold his child girl, this means that he brings harm and trouble to himself.
As for the person who dreams of having a child, he grows up in the dream, this means that this person will die.

Interpretation of a child in a dream for Ibn Sirin

  1. Said Ibn Sirin in his interpretation of seeing the child in a dream that the child indicates the existence of an enemy, but he is weak and cowardly.
  2. And he said in his interpretation that the person who dreams that he sees himself as a child in his dream, meaning that this person may lose his manhood and lust.
  3. But there is another indicator, that he was in great distress, but it was due to anxiety, and comfort came.
  4. As for the person who dreams that he sees a child for himself and carries him, this means that this person will be a manager of a large property.
  5. As for the person who dreams that he has a group of children in a dream, this means that this person will be exposed to them and will suffer great hardship, and he said that this interpretation is based on the fact that raising children is a great thing. Difficulty and many worries.
  6. The child shows his vision of worries, sorrows, and fatigue gently on the ignorant.
  7. Whoever takes a baby girl or carries her while she is imprisoned, tired, indebted, or poor, may God be pleased with her.
  8. Otherwise, the child is sadness and sadness, especially if he is born through the mouth, this indicates death
  9. Whoever dreams that he eats a child, he eats what is forbidden.
  10. If a woman sees that she eats a child, this indicates that she is pregnant; because the pregnant woman craves it and eats it.
  11. Whoever sees that the boy urinates to wash with it, he interprets it in two ways: repaying the debt, and wasting the money he lost on the boy, and this may have a consequence.
  12. If you dream of seeing children , it means more than the desire to feel motherhood or fatherhood.
  13. It can refer to more things such as you will put more effort and new endeavors in your life.
  14. And also that there is something that needs a lot of care and attention from you. The interpretation of seeing a child in a dream may vary from one person to another.
  15. If the mother dreams that her child is sick with a mild illness, this means that he is in good health, but he will do some simple things that will upset her.
  16. Young children are small worries, and the dream has a psychological meaning, all children love them, but they tire them sometimes, and this is a figurative comparison to their fears. They are innocent and daily worries, but they are very busy when I talk about daily worries such as studying, dressing, or some daily symptoms.
  17. And the dream only indicates that she is thinking about these worries more than necessary and worrying about them more than they deserve.
  18. The interpretation of the dream may vary from one person to another depending on whether the child is primarily the dreamer's responsibility or whether it is a responsibility entrusted to him by someone else.
  19. Most of the time, seeing a child in a dream reflects the dreamer's fears about having children.
  20. But it can often symbolize innocence, warmth, and new beginnings
  21. For women in their childbearing years, this dream may be a reflection of a desire that will actually be realized in reality.
  22. As for men, this type of dream can be a sign of stress as a result of not wanting to experience the effects of fatherhood and bear the responsibility of the child.
  23. If you dream of a hungry child , this is a clear indication that you are heavily dependent on others
  24. But if you dream of his death, this means that something will end soon.
  25. And if you forget that you have a child in a dream, this means that you are trying to hide your weakness from others.
  26. But if you see that you are going to the hospital to give birth to a child, this means that you will have to take care of matters related to your independence.
  27. And if you dream of a crying child , this means that a part of you needs care and many goals to achieve.
  28. Whoever sees that he carries a small child will come to him a little anxiety, then he will be relieved.
  29. The child generally gives a sense of joy, security, and peace because children are causes of joy and happiness in every home for parents...

As for the person who dreams that he saw a son for himself and carries him, this means that this person will be the manager of a large property. As for the person who dreams that he is with a group of children in a dream, this means that this person will be subjected to them and will be severely distressed, and he said that this interpretation is based on the fact that raising children is a great deal. Difficulty and many worries. The child shows his vision of worries, sorrows, and fatigue gently on the ignorant. Whoever took a girl or carried her while she was imprisoned or tired or indebted or poor, may God be pleased with her. Otherwise, the child is sadness and grief, especially if he was born through the mouth, this indicates death. Whoever dreams that he eats a child, he eats something forbidden. If a woman sees that she is eating a child, this indicates that she is pregnant; because the pregnant woman desires him and eats him. And whoever sees that the boy urinates so he washes himself with it, it is interpreted in two ways: paying off the debt, and wasting the money that he lost on the boy, and this may have consequences. If you dream of seeing children, it means more than just a desire to feel motherhood or fatherhood. It can indicate more things like you will make more efforts and new endeavors in your life. Also, that there is something that needs a lot of care and attention from you. The interpretation of seeing a child in a dream may vary from one person to another. If a mother dreams that her child is sick with a mild illness, this means that he is in good health, but he will do some simple things that bother her. Small children are small worries, and the dream has a psychological meaning, all children love them, but they get tired sometimes, and this is a metaphor for their anxieties. They are innocent and daily anxieties, but they are very busy when I talk about daily anxieties like studying or dressing or some daily symptoms. And the dream only means that she thinks about these worries too much and worries about them more than they deserve. The interpretation of the dream may vary from one person to another depending on whether the child is primarily the dreamer's responsibility or whether it is a responsibility entrusted to him by someone else. Most of the time, seeing a child in a dream reflects the dreamer's anxieties about having children. But it can often symbolize innocence, warmth, and new beginnings. For women who are in the process of giving birth, this dream can be a reflection of a desire that will actually come true in reality. As for men, this type of dream can be a sign of tension as a result of not wanting to experience the effects of fatherhood and bear the responsibility of the child. If you dream of a hungry child, this is a clear indication that you rely heavily on others. But if you dream of his death, it means that something will end soon. And if you forget that you have a child in a dream, this means that you are trying to hide your weakness from others. But if you see that you are going to the hospital to give birth to a child, this means that you will have to take care of matters related to your independence. And if you dream of a child crying, this means that a part of you needs care and many goals to achieve. Whoever sees that he is carrying a small child, he will come to him with little worry, then he will relax. A child generally gives a feeling of joy, security, and peace because children are the causes of joy and happiness in every home for parents...

When an unmarried girl sees herself eating mushrooms, it may reflect an improvement in material circumstances, and God is Most High and Knows Best.

**Interpretation of a Dream of Eating Cherries in a Dream**

Dream interpretation of my mother eating cherries in a dream: It can be a reference to achieving goals, and God is Most High and Knows Best. When you see yourself eating green cherries, it may be a sign of high status, and God knows best. In the case of a married woman seeing herself eating green cherries in a dream, it may indicate a high status, and God is Most High and Knows Best. While eating sour cherries can indicate things that are not good, and God knows best.

**Interpretation of a Dream of Eating Cherry Jam in a Dream**

Dream interpretation of eating cherry jam in a dream: It can indicate good things, and God knows best. In the case of the dreamer seeing himself eating cherry jam in a dream, it may indicate the fulfillment of desires, and God is Most High and Knows All. If a single girl sees herself eating cherry jam, it may lead to the achievement of goals, God willing. Seeing cherry jam can express profit and sustenance, and God knows best.

**Interpretation of a Dream of Eating Orange Jam in a Dream**

Interpretation of a dream of eating orange jam in a dream: It can lead to getting rid of problems, and God is Most High and Knows Best. When you see a married man eating orange jam, it may represent liberation from worry and sadness, and God is Most High and Knows All. If a married woman is seen eating orange jam, it may indicate goodness and an improvement in circumstances, God willing. When a single girl sees herself eating orange jam, it may indicate good news, and God knows best.

**Interpretation of a Dream of Eating Peach Jam in a Dream**

Dream interpretation of eating peaches in a dream: It can be a sign of success, and God knows best. Seeing a married man eating peach jam can mean good luck, and God knows best. If a young man is seen eating peach jam, it may be an indication of harmony with the family, and God knows best. Seeing peach jam can also bode well, and God knows best.

**Interpretation of a Dream of Eating Strawberry Jam in a Dream**

The interpretation of a dream of eating strawberry jam in a dream can be an indication of the fulfillment of desires, God willing. If the dreamer sees strawberry jam, it may indicate an increase in opportunities, and God knows best. You can also see strawberry jam...

title: Dream interpretation: A calm, clear sea and seeing the coast in a dream

preview.text:
Interpreting a dream about a raging sea or a calm sea.

The sea in a single woman's dream.
Interpreting a dream about swimming in the sea.
Interpreting a dream about the sea for a pregnant woman.

Seeing the sea in a married woman's dream.
Seeing a small lake in a dream is interpreted as a left-handed woman who loves direct or sexual contact, because the lake is stable and does not flow in it, and kills anyone who falls in it if it is deep and does not push him. on the shore to stay alive like the big sea or ocean.
Seeing the sea in a dream indicates a high position, such as a righteous ruler or kings, rulers, scholars, ministers, and strong spirits. It comes from the door of strength from the danger that he may find or find. And their generosity, as well as the waves of the sea indicate men who follow a high-ranking person in status, arguments, prayers, and commands. In other interpretations, Ibn Sirin says that the sea shows the raging turmoil that affects many, and the disturbed one that may strike and be heavy, and the ships of the sea are the protection of God Almighty for those who are protected, like Noah's ark. Peace be upon him.

The raging sea fish is its people who are ruthless, their youth, the elderly, or the guilty who eat each other's money and destroy each other and themselves among the common people or the rulers, rulers, and holders of positions. In general, seeing the calm waves of the sea is better in terms of goodness and interpretation than seeing the raging waves of the sea or many crawling waters or turbulent waves, and what applies to the sea is exactly what applies to the ocean because in their understanding, a very large mass of water fell in its middle and you do not see the other shore.
Whoever sees himself entering the sea swimming, or hitting the water with cold or winter, or feeling cold, or shivering, and the wind sores in his sleep, or the sorrow of the ruler, or imprisonment, or torture, or a deadly disease, or turmoil, and if he drowns in that feeling and place, then he dies in this matter from whoever hits him. And the sea may refer to hellfire, and the ship indicates the straight path that all men walk in the Hereafter, some cross with lightning speed or slowly to approach paradise, and some fall into hell under it. As for the waves, they are according to their strength and violence or their purity and weakness in terms of good and evil, and the interpretation of the vision according to that, and similarly, seeing the sea from the lake is different from the large ocean from a small swamp. or a little water.

He was hit by mud or clay from its bottom, so whoever saw that he had entered the sea and was hit by mud or clay from the bottom, he was from the great king or from the authority of the place. And whoever crosses a sea or river to the other side passes with a whisper, or fear, or fear, and is freed from it. Some say that whoever sees the sea has struck what he hopes for, and whoever sees that he has entered the sea, then he has entered the work of the king, and he will deceive him. If he drinks it until he dies from it, then he takes money from the king and finances it with his long life and strength.
If he draws from it, he asks for work from the king, and takes it as much as he drew from it, if he pours it into a vessel, then he will reap from a king a lot, or God Almighty will make a situation in him. collects money, and the state is stronger, wider and longer than the sea, because it is a gift from God. And whoever bathes in the sea, his sins are forgiven and his worries about the king are removed. And whoever urinates in the sea settles in sins. And whoever sees the sea from afar sees terror, and it is said that something will approach him and he hopes. To see the calm sea is better than its turbulent waves. people and impoverish others. Its winds are its livelihood, its arrival, its accidents, its storms, its diseases, and its fish are its livelihood, its animals, its animals, its insects, its storms, its kings, its thieves, and the source of its worries and anxieties. If the sultan is in the summer and in this sea, then he may swim in knowledge and mix with scholars, or expand in money and trade according to his glorification of the sea and his strength on water.

If he drowned in his state and did not die by drowning, and he did not feel fear or distress, then he wandered in his reality, and among them is their saying: So-and-so drowned in the world and drowned in bliss. and knowledge with the sultan. But if he entered it or swam in it in winter and cold, or shivered, then a disaster has befallen him from the sultan, either imprisonment or torment, or he will be struck by a disease, dropsy, and harmful winds, or fall into a deadly death. turmoil. If he drowned in time, he was killed in his camp or his religion was corrupted in the sedition.
Dream interpretation that water or the sea:

Whoever saw in a dream that the water had dried up or the sea had dried up in its place and its water had disappeared and dried up, or spread on the land of water, or prevented the rain, this is evidence of the state. disappearance, or the authority goes with the hand of the country to be lost, or disappears from the hand of whom it is attributed to, or a great loss, or the seizure of the state and damage, but if he saw the water returned or found it in another. A nearby place is evidence of the return of the state after a disturbance or conflict that did not last long.
Interpreting the vision of receiving and drinking from its waters:
Whoever sees that he has taken the sea water and drunk it, or even possessed it, he has gathered money from a ruler like this, or has obtained something similar from this world. And whoever entered the sea and was hit by mud or clay from its bottom, the greatest king or the authority of the place hit him. And whoever crosses a sea or river to the other side passes with a whisper, or fear, or fear, and is freed from it. Some say that whoever sees the sea has struck what he hopes for, and whoever sees that he has entered the sea, then he has entered the work of the king and he will deceive him.
If he drinks it until he dies from it, then he takes money from the king and finances it with his long life and his authorities, and the state is stronger, wider and longer than the sea, because it is a gift from God. . And whoever bathes in the sea, his sins are forgiven and his worries about the king are removed. And whoever urinates in the sea settles in sins. And whoever sees the sea from afar sees terror, and it is said that something will approach him and he hopes. To see the calm sea is better than its turbulent waves.

Dream interpretation that a person is in a place and sees the sea from afar or that it is difficult for him to reach the water:
This, in its interpretation, indicates that he will soon witness terror and fatigue, and it is interpreted in another way, that seeing water or the sea in a dream that you do not see, something that the dreamer hoped for is approaching him. his life.

title: The number of freelance translators in Kuwait is quick to respond on WhatsApp.

preview.text: We present you with a list of dream interpreters' numbers in Kuwait who translate dreams on WhatsApp. All you have to do is save the dream interpreter's number on WhatsApp, contact them, and report your dream or send it on WhatsApp chat and they will respond quickly: Dream interpreters' numbers in Kuwait Sheikh Thamer Al-Amer, dream interpreter, 97145717. He lives in Kuwait. Make sure to report your dream very briefly and mention all the symbols you saw in the vision. Sheikh Saleh Al-Naham 99069868 Sheikh Abu Abdullah (Egyptian from Kuwait) 99558259 Make sure not to repeat your dream during the call or send your dream on WhatsApp chat more than once. Sheikh Abdul Rahman Al-Salem, Kuwaiti dream interpreter, 97477605 Sheikh Abu Obaida, young Kuwaiti, 99543445 Sheikh Abu Hajer 99364002 If you call and they don't answer, you might be calling outside of peak hours. Make sure the time of the call is appropriate and not during sleep or prayer time.
